report.title: Explore records 2 mapping using index_locations_samples
report.description: Report designed for the explore records mapping facility in iRecord, with additional parameters. This version depends on the Spatial Index Builder module to index the list of locations that users can set in their preferences as their locality, for significantly improved performance.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND o.record_status not in ('I','T') AND (#ownData#=1 OR o.record_status not in ('D','R')) AND ('#searchArea#'='' OR st_intersects(o.public_geom, st_geomfromtext('#searchArea#',900913))) AND (#ownData#=0 OR CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying)='#currentUser#') AND (o.survey_id=#survey_id# OR #survey_id#=0) AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence IDs to filter to.

param.name: currentUser
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: location_id
param.description: Provide the location to display records for

param.name: ownLocality
param.join: JOIN index_locations_samples lfilter ON lfilter.sample_id=o.sample_id and lfilter.location_id=#location_id#

param.name: taxon_groups
param.description: List of taxon group IDs to view data for

param.name: ownGroups
param.join: JOIN taxon_groups tgfilter ON tgfilter.id=o.taxon_group_id AND ('#taxon_groups#'='0' OR tgfilter.id IN (#taxon_groups#))

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

column.name: taxon
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.preferred_taxon=o.default_common_name then o.preferred_taxon ELSE o.preferred_taxon || COALESCE(' | ' || o.default_common_name, '') END

column.name: recorder
column.sql: CASE w.id WHEN iwwa.from_website_id THEN '' ELSE w.title || '-> ' END || CASE WHEN LENGTH(o.recorders)>30 THEN 'Recorder' ELSE o.recorders END

column.name: sc
column.sql: case o.record_status when 'C' then case o.certainty when 'C' then 'green' when 'L' then 'orange' when 'U' then '#800000' else 'blue' end when 'V' then 'green' when 'D' then 'orange' when 'R' then '#800000' else 'black' end

column.name: fc
column.sql: case o.record_status when 'V' then 'green' when 'D' then 'orange' when 'R' then '#800000' else 'blue' end
